title: Video of BJP Supporters Watching Exit Polls in London is Morphed
subtitle: Exit Poll Result Viral Video Fact Check: Captioned “BJP supporters watching #ExitPoll2019 @ London”, a video shows a crowd of people cheering in a pub as a big screen streams the exit polls, predicting an NDA victory in elections.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video has been morphed, and carries the watermark “Atheist_Krishna”, a well-known photo and video editor on Twitter.

In fact, the same video can be found on his timeline as well. An archived version of the post can be accessed here.
